concept.title: 246.870-1 DEFINITION. “AUTHORIZED SUPPLIER,” AS USED IN THIS SUBPART, MEANS A SUPPLIER, DISTRIBUTOR, OR AN AFTERMARKET MANUFACTURER WITH A CONTRACTUAL ARRANGEMENT WITH, OR THE EXPRESS WRITTEN AUTHORITY OF, THE ORIGINAL MANUFACTURER OR CURRENT DESIGN ACTIVITY TO BUY, STOCK, REPACKAGE, SELL, OR DISTRIBUTE THE PART.
